resources.string: Thank you! By using this app you\'re collecting data that will be used to build an intelligent, totally offline mapper for the London Underground.

What data is collected? This app records a unique, anonymous ID for your device, and every 20-30 seconds whilst it\'s enabled it checks which WiFi networks are visible. That\'s it - no personal data, no location data, nothing that can identify you, etc.

How do use the app? Just use the button at the top to enable scanning whenever you\'re travelling on the London Underground network, and disable it when you finish your journey; the scanner will run in the background, so you don\'t need to keep the app open.
PS. Don\'t worry if you forget to turn the scanner on before you start travelling! You can turn it on at any point, above ground or below.
